channel.title: Client nulling when fighting Jad + Chaos ele?
channel.description:
Alright, so I've been searching and couldn't find a fix for this. Using RuneCronic as a base, with Galkons client.
When fighting Chaos Elemental, Tormented demons, and Jad, I get these errors in the client
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method101(client.java:8407) at client.method96(client.java:8149) at client.method95(client.java:8115) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3500) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2558) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:5099) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
I believe it's cuaing an error when it uses a certain type of attack. Like both Jad, Tormented demons, and Chaos ele uses magic + range, and I think it throws the error when it uses one of those two. Any help?

item.title: Client nulling when fighting Jad + Chaos ele?
item.dc:creator: @ForsaKenX0 ForsaKenX0
item.description:
